long_description: Scott Contessa Speedster 35 women's road bike offers an aluminum frame with aerodynamic tubing and dependable, economical components for solid road performance with great value. Double-butted 6061 aluminum frame boasts aerodynamic tube shaping for sleek, responsive performance. Carbon fork with alloy steer tube reduces weight and damps energy-draining road vibrations. Shimano triple crankset is paired with a 11-28 cassette for gear combinations to handle every ride, from long climbs to fast descents and everything between. Shimano derailleurs and shifters deliver dependable, responsive shifting through the 27 gears. Alex Race 28 Aero Profile rims are wrapped with Schwalbe Lugano tires to provide smooth-rolling performance. Specs on the Scott Contessa Speedster 35 women's bike are subject to change.
short_description: Scott Contessa Speedster 35 women's road bike offers an aluminum frame with aerodynamic tubing and dependable, economical components for solid road performance with great value.
